title: Personal Portfolio
description: This personal portfolio showcases a collection of projects and skills in web development. It includes practical examples of designing, developing, and deploying web applications using modern technologies.

mainFeatures.interactiveUserInterface: Responsive and modern design with smooth interactions.
mainFeatures.projectManagement: Allows users to add, edit, and delete projects.
mainFeatures.adminPanel: Tool to manage and visualize projects from a centralized view.

issues.title: Performance Issues
issues.description: Difficulties optimizing the page load time, especially on mobile devices.

issues.title: Browser Compatibility
issues.description: Inconsistencies in display and behavior across different web browsers, requiring additional adjustments.

issues.title: API Integration
issues.description: Challenges integrating with external services, which required a detailed review of the documentation and code adjustments.

title: E-Commerce Site
description: An online store that allows users to purchase products, with an integrated payment system and inventory management.

mainFeatures.securePaymentSystem: Integration with payment gateways for secure transactions.
mainFeatures.productManagement: Features to add, edit, and delete products from the inventory.
mainFeatures.orderHistory: Allows users to view their purchase history and order status.

issues.title: Payment Security
issues.description: Ensuring all transactions are conducted securely and meet security standards.

issues.title: System Scalability
issues.description: Challenges handling a large number of users and transactions simultaneously.

issues.title: Integration with External Services
issues.description: Challenges integrating with third-party services for payment processing and inventory management.

title: Tech Blog
description: A blog that allows users to read and publish articles about technology, with features like comments and tags.

mainFeatures.commentSystem: Allows users to comment on articles and respond to other comments.
mainFeatures.tagsAndCategories: Organizes articles into tags and categories for easier searching.
mainFeatures.authenticationSystem: Allows users to register and log in to post and manage their articles.

issues.title: Loading Performance
issues.description: Issues with loading times, especially when there are many comments.

issues.title: User Management
issues.description: Challenges in managing and authenticating users, including data protection.

issues.title: Database Scalability
issues.description: Problems scaling the database to handle a large number of articles and users.

title: Task Management App
description: An application for managing daily tasks with features to add, edit, delete tasks, and organize them by priority.

mainFeatures.priorityOrganization: Allows users to organize tasks by priority levels.
mainFeatures.intuitiveInterface: Easy-to-use design for quickly adding, editing, and deleting tasks.

issues.title: State Management
issues.description: Issues managing the state of tasks efficiently as the number of tasks increases.

issues.title: User Interface
issues.description: Challenges creating a user interface that is both functional and intuitive.

issues.title: Data Persistence
issues.description: Problems maintaining data persistence between user sessions.
